Class BinaryTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • BinaryTree

  • public class BinaryTree
extends java.lang.Object
    Binary Tree that contains nodes of words in the file, and containing the frequency of each word.
    Since:
    March 26, 2020

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) java.lang.String fileName
      Name of the file that was read
      (package private) Node head
      Head is the first word in the file that was read and is the head of the tree.
      (package private) java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> words
      ArrayList of words that are to be used to create the tree

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BinaryTree(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> words, java.lang.String fileName)
      Constructor for the Binary Tree, creates the Tree given an ArrayList of words.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void createTree()
      Creates the Binary tree by doing lexiographical comparison.
      private int depth(Node node)
      Recursive function calculating the highest depth of the tree, incremented only if the there exists either a left or right node
      private void insertWord(Node node, java.lang.String word)
      Creates the Binary tree by doing lexiographical comparison.
      private int maximumDepth()
      Finds the maximum depth of the tree.
      private void mostOftenWords()
      Calls the function oftenWords, this function finds the word(s) with the highest frequency and prints them out with their frequency
      private int nodeSearch(Node node, java.lang.String word, int frequency)
      Recursive search in the tree for the Word
      private int numberOfUniqueWords(Node node, int count)
      A recursive function and returns how many nodes there are in the tree with a frequency of 1.
      private int numberOfWords(Node node, int count)
      A recursive fucntion and returns how many nodes there are in the tree.
      private java.util.ArrayList<Node> oftenWords(Node node, java.util.ArrayList<Node> nodes)
      Recursive function that finds the the highest frequency, and adds that Node to an ArrayList of nodes.
      void optionMenu()
      Option menu that allows the user to search for a word in a tree, or print the tree, or quit the application.
      private void orderPrint(Node node)
      Prints the words in order
      private void postPrint(Node node)
      Prints the words in post order
      private void prePrint(Node node)
      Prints the words in pre order
      private void printStatisticsOfTree()
      After the tree is created, this prints the statistcs of the tree including, number of words, number of words with frequency of 1, words with the highest frequency and the depth of the tree.
      void printTree()
      Prints the words in the tree given the type that the user requests.
      void searchForWord(java.lang.String word)
      Searches for a word in the Tree, and prints out the frequency of the word if the word is found.
      private int totalNumberOfUniqueWords()
      Calls the function numberOfUniqueWords, which is a recursive fucntion and returns how many nodes there are in the tree with a frequency of 1.
      private int totalNumberOfWords()
      Calls the function numberOfWords, which is a recursive fucntion and returns how many nodes there are in the tree.

        word - the word to add to the tree

        Prints the words in the tree given the type that the user requests.

      • totalNumberOfWords

        private int totalNumberOfWords()
        Calls the function numberOfWords, which is a recursive fucntion and returns how many nodes there are in the tree.
        Returns:
        the number of nodes are in the tree

      • numberOfWords

        private int numberOfWords(Node node,
                          int count)
        A recursive fucntion and returns how many nodes there are in the tree.
        Parameters:
        node - Node at which you are
        count - How many nodes have been counted so far
        Returns:
        the number of nodes counted so far

      • totalNumberOfUniqueWords

        private int totalNumberOfUniqueWords()
        Calls the function numberOfUniqueWords, which is a recursive fucntion and returns how many nodes there are in the tree with a frequency of 1.
        Returns:
        the number of nodes in the tree with a frequency of 1

      • numberOfUniqueWords

        private int numberOfUniqueWords(Node node,
                                int count)
        A recursive function and returns how many nodes there are in the tree with a frequency of 1.
        Parameters:
        node - Node at which you are
        count - How many nodes have been counted so far with a frequency of 1.
        Returns:
        the number of nodes counted so far with a frequency of 1.

      • mostOftenWords

        private void mostOftenWords()
        Calls the function oftenWords, this function finds the word(s) with the highest frequency and prints them out with their frequency

      • oftenWords

        private java.util.ArrayList<Node> oftenWords(Node node,
                                             java.util.ArrayList<Node> nodes)
        Recursive function that finds the the highest frequency, and adds that Node to an ArrayList of nodes.
        Parameters:
        node - Node which contains the word with the highest frequency
        nodes - an ArrayList of all other words with a matching frequency to that of the highest frequency present in the tree
        Returns:
        ArrayList of Nodes which cna be used to print the words with the highest frequency

      • maximumDepth

        private int maximumDepth()
        Finds the maximum depth of the tree.
        Returns:
        Integer with the value of the depth of the tree

      • depth

        private int depth(Node node)
        Recursive function calculating the highest depth of the tree, incremented only if the there exists either a left or right node
        Parameters:
        node - Node at which you are
        Returns:
        Deepest level in the tree

      • printStatisticsOfTree

        private void printStatisticsOfTree()
        After the tree is created, this prints the statistcs of the tree including, number of words, number of words with frequency of 1, words with the highest frequency and the depth of the tree.

      • searchForWord

        public void searchForWord(java.lang.String word)
        Searches for a word in the Tree, and prints out the frequency of the word if the word is found.
        Parameters:
        word - The word you want to search for.

      • nodeSearch

        private int nodeSearch(Node node,
                       java.lang.String word,
                       int frequency)
        Recursive search in the tree for the Word
        Parameters:
        node - Node at which you are at
        word - The word to search for
        Returns:
        A node is returned if the word is found, else it's null

      • optionMenu

        public void optionMenu()
        Option menu that allows the user to search for a word in a tree, or print the tree, or quit the application.
